facts.1: World Mental Health Day is observed on October 10th to raise awareness about mental health issues and promote mental well-being.
facts.2: The day was first celebrated in 1992 at the initiative of the World Federation for Mental Health.
facts.3: Each year, World Mental Health Day focuses on a specific theme to address different aspects of mental health.

facts.1: National Cake Decorating Day celebrates the art and creativity of cake decorating, encouraging people to create beautiful and delicious cakes.
facts.2: Cake decorating involves various techniques, including piping, fondant shaping, and sugar crafting.
facts.3: The day is a great opportunity for both professional bakers and home enthusiasts to showcase their cake decorating skills.

facts.1: National Handbag Day is dedicated to celebrating handbags as essential fashion accessories that combine style and functionality.
facts.2: Handbags have been used for centuries, evolving from simple pouches to sophisticated fashion statements.
facts.3: The day encourages people to appreciate the craftsmanship and design of handbags and to explore different styles and trends.
